name: Ghost Hunter: VR-AR game
description:
They are among us.
Take your VR headset and dive into dark side of our world.

Take a challenge in a battle with evil incarnate, fight with revengeful souls and sometimes you have a chance to win. Armored with mystical psycho-blaster and fight with otherwordly forces.

You can be unbelievable cool but you gonna fall to rise and fight again.
